newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARIAN O/N RATES CLOSE STEADY AT 23 PERCENT.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARIAN O/N RATES CLOSE STEADY AT 23 PERCENT.

text.p: Hungarian overnight interest rates closed steady at 23.25 percent after quiet trading in a narrow range of 23.00 to 23.25 percent, traders said.
"Everybody knows the others' positions, and they are slowly building up their reserves," said Peter Piros of Europai Kereskedelmi Bank.
He added, that the rates might ease further towards the end of the banks' two-week reserve period (at the end of the month) but "present levels seem realistic and holding for the moment."
